name: Gromacs Gaussian charges
body:
### Welcome to the GitHub Page of my Gromacs fork.

The master branch in this fork implements Gaussian charges (instead of point-like ones), as published in [J. Chem. Theory Comput., 2014, 10 (12), pp 5513â€“5519](http://dx.doi.org/10.1021/ct5009069)


### Go back to [my Homepage on GitHub](http://marcello-sega.github.io/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
